rawContent:
# Create Order Use Case

[useCase]
id = "create-order"
name = "Create Order"
description = "Client submits a new care service order without registration"
asRole = "client"
iWant = "to order a care service"
soThat = "I can receive care assistance for myself or a family member"

[useCase.meta]
isActive = true
priority = 1
platform = "client-app"

[useCase.conditions]
pre = [
  "Client has phone number",
  "Client knows service type needed",
  "Client knows location and preferred time"
]
post = [
  "Order is created in system",
  "Order status is 'created'",
  "Admin receives notification",
  "Client receives SMS confirmation"
]

[relations]
roles = ["client", "visitor"]
guards = ["public"]
routes = ["client-order-form"]
entities = ["order", "service"]
components = ["service-card"]
events = ["order-created"]
platforms = ["client-app"]

[implementation]
route = "/prototype/client/order"
component = "OrderForm"
file = "src/prototype/pages/client/OrderForm.tsx"
status = "implemented"

[[flow]]
id = "start"
type = "start"
label = "Client opens order form"

[[flow]]
id = "enter_phone"
type = "action"
label = "Enter phone number"

[[flow]]
id = "select_service"
type = "action"
label = "Select service type"

[[flow]]
id = "enter_location"
type = "action"
label = "Enter address and city"

[[flow]]
id = "select_datetime"
type = "action"
label = "Select date and time"

[[flow]]
id = "add_notes"
type = "action"
label = "Add optional notes"

[[flow]]
id = "validate"
type = "decision"
label = "Form valid?"

[[flow]]
id = "submit"
type = "action"
label = "Submit order"

[[flow]]
id = "create_order"
type = "action"
label = "Create order record, send SMS"

[[flow]]
id = "show_confirmation"
type = "action"
label = "Show order confirmation"

[[flow]]
id = "error"
type = "action"
label = "Show validation errors"

[[flow]]
id = "end"
type = "end"
label = "Order created successfully"
